name: Tomasz Lee
profile_summary: Dynamic Technical Manager with 9+ years of experience in software development and technical leadership. Proficient in project management and team management, with a strong track record of leading development projects to successful completion. Exceptional communication skills facilitate collaborative cross-team efforts. Specialized in architectural design for high-performance systems and adept at conducting thorough code reviews. Experienced in utilizing **.NET**, **C#**, **ReactJS**, **NextJS**, **Apache Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, **Redis**, and cloud services to build robust and efficient applications. Committed to optimizing developer tooling and leveraging open-source technologies, while also exploring modern programming languages like **Rust**.
